name: widely
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: including a lot of different places, people, subjects, etc.

example.egtrans: 他们俩都游历过很多地方。

example.eg: His plays are still widely performed in the USA.
example.egtrans: 他的戏剧仍在美国各地上演。

example.eg: French used to be widely spoken in Cambodia.
example.egtrans: 在柬埔寨，过去人们普遍讲法语。

example.eg: His work on DNA was widely admired.
example.egtrans: 他在 DNA 研究方面的工作得到了广泛赞誉。

example.eg: This is a widely held but mistaken belief.
example.egtrans: 这是一种普遍但是错误的看法。

example.eg: This theory is no longer widely accepted.
example.egtrans: 这一理论不再被人们广泛接受。

example.eg: Prices vary widely from shop to shop.
example.egtrans: 商店之间的价格相差很大。
